keyFacts: The document is a communication header dated August 12, 2019, sent from a Verizon Samsung Galaxy smartphone.
Michael Thomas is identified as a Material Handler Foreman and Tovia Noel as a Correctional Officer, both listed as recipients.
This document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting these individuals may have been involved in or connected to related facilities or events.
